member.name: D3D10_TEX3D_RTV
member.summary: Specifies the subresource(s) from a 3D texture to use in a render-target view.

member.name: D3D10_TEX3D_RTV.MipSlice
member.summary: The index of the mipmap level to use (see mip slice).

member.name: D3D10_TEX3D_RTV.WSize
member.summary: Number of depth levels to use in the render-target view, starting from FirstWSlice. A value of -1 indicates all of the slices along the w axis, starting from FirstWSlice.
